result.reason: The issue lacks reproducible steps and expected-versus-actual behavior, and maintainers have already requested a retest on current builds with evidence.
result.approach: Request a retest on v1.79.x/upstream dev with exact connection-option settings, credential state, step-by-step reproduction, and logs/screenshots before any fix work.
